website_summaries.verdict: High-end price point, but worth the investment due to construction and durability. All the benefits of All-Clad stainless steel cookware, but with nonstick ease.
pros: Heavy construction with cool handles and slightly inverted pan edges for better control of food
cons: Not as dishwasher safe as advertised
May be too heavy for some users
Lids can trap and burn food

customer_reviews.title: The coat of the pots is peeling!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended!!! I paid more than 500$ and the coat of the pots is peeling .... They don’t want to give me service because it’s more than a month since I bought it... Doesn’t worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Eli Sabag

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating doesn’t stay stuck to the pan. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick coating started peeling within the first couple months. I stacked the pans with towels between them in the cupboard when storing, only over used wood or silicon utensils, and didn’t put them in the dishwasher. Just bad quality. I have much cheaper pans from Cuisinart that held up better. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Happy but Disappointed. I was so happy to receive my All Clad Anodized pots and pans. Packaged well and Amazon delivered right to the front doo! I was disappointed after opening and cleaning that I noticed two of the pans have a divet or uneven surface and was anodized over it, so for the brand of All Clad, this was unexpected. Set looks beautiful but am wondering if these were seconds? I noticed quickly so not sure how it passed quality control? Would like to have these two items replaced as the set is new and All Clad is an investment for the serious chef!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Meihls

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pans!
customer_reviews.text: As a longtime stainless All-Clad user, I didn’t think clean up could get any easier, but these just wipe clean with zero effort. I bought them for my kids and had enough for add a few to my stainless collection, give some to my college girl and some to her older brother too. They love them. The first time my sons boyfriend cooked in them he was shocked at how quickly and evenly they heated. He wants more! ( They only pan that beats them is my nonstick ScanPan because there is no screw inside the pan to gunk up.)
customer_reviews.author: Contessa Mcpike

customer_reviews.title: Non stick All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money then get them. These will last a long long time. Pro chefs do not clean up but you will. I think they are more realistic than the regular All-Clad and an interesting assortment of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pantos

customer_reviews.title: Sticking food after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Pan started to stick within 4 months of use. Specifically bought this expensive set so food wouldn't stick. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who love to cook!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pots and pans I’ve ever seen or used. Nonstick, durable and LOVE how most of lids are interchangeable. These are a must have for anyone who loves to cook. The only negative I can think of is they are pretty heavy. I have to use two hands when holding the pots full of food
customer_reviews.author: Doran R.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cookware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Would remove all stars and return if possible. The bottom of these pots scratched the bottom of my sink so badly, I’m p*ssed! One pan came with a dent/surface chip, seller remedied quickly. Cook surface on stock pot discolored first use - boiling noodles. Handles are the worst most uncomfortable handle of any cookware ever made! Pans are super heavy, and the bottoms do not move well over cast iron grates. Handles get SUPER hot, super fast. I have used a large mix of low to high end cookware over the years, both commercial and home use, I liked my first cheap Kirkland brand infinitely more than these. WORST COOKWARE EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saralyn M

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware Set
customer_reviews.text: These pans cook very evenly, clean up easily. Make sure not to cook items with shells, such as clams, mussels as they could scratch the surface. The pan are a good weight and built very well. Today I also purchased a 12" fry pan and recently purchased a 12" grill pan! I also asked some friends who are professional chefs and they use All-Clad cookware!
customer_reviews.author: HMan

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware, not so great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: We love our new all-clad cookware. It heats up very quickly on our Jenn Air induction cooktop and is super easy to clean. Unfortunately the 8qt stock pot was destroyed in shipping (warped and lid shattered). It would be nice if a single part of the set could be returned. Since we need induction cookware now (can't cook without it) and the UPS Store is quite a distance away we ended up buying another one for $155. We love and highly recommend the product, but just wish the packaging had been better.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah S Drysdale

customer_reviews.title: This will probably be the last set of cookware I'll ever need to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny so easy to clean and use. Tough and heavy I bought a reduced price set due to package damage (box damage) the set is fine, the box I threw away, best 60 bucks savings. I knew about this material because i have a Lecktro maid electric frying pan that my mother bought about 30 years ago it's the same metal/material and its outstanding and we've always used metal spatulas and knives and scratches dont affect its performance. Just wish the handles were a better shape their long and thin and get pretty hot. Nothing a pot holder won't fix though.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Defective items delivered!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought all clad was supposed to be great! Received Damaged items and torn up box delivered by post office. Lids with bent rims, small fry pan with some type of mark or residue. I would just like those defective items replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Bow

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and defective on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. For Mothers day my mom was so excited to get new cooking ware only to unbox defective and damaged pots and lids coming apart. No response from All-Clad and the customer service phone number is out of service and not working. Only contact is through email and still waiting. Just requested a complete return and refund. see pictures
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will love it
customer_reviews.text: These pans are amazing and they are easy to clean and to use. I am very happy to have a cookware set of this caliber now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: rbt_austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it as her Christmas gift. She has been begging for this for months. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique La Garde

customer_reviews.title: All clad is a top brand - can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: So we bought these for Christmas and have used them almost daily and so far the non-stick is perfect. Only time will tell. our previous set, of a diff manufacturer, lasted 10 years. I expect the same here, The pots don't really nest like our old set did, but the clear lids beat the pants off the metal lids on our old set. They should include or offer to sell high temp rubber handles for the pots, pans and the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dourov

customer_reviews.title: Made in China junk
customer_reviews.text: I would give it have a star if it’s available, but the set very expensive the surface peeled all clad is not back in this product that, stay away stay away junk made in China junk junk made in China jump do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: joseph farah

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are amazing! Solidly built and feels like a professional pan should. Cooking with them is a joy and cleaning is easier. The manufacturer says they are dishwasher safe but I still prefer to hand wash. The quality is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a housewarming gift to myself... They are LARGE compared to the old set I had, which I love. They distribute heat perfectly, always even which makes for great cooking. Not only are they great for cooking, they are super easy to clean. If anything does stick after cooking, it just takes a quick soak to easily remove. I would buy this set again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buzzes on induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, nonstick works very well. Makes loud buzzing sound while being used on induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend. Dammaged, second hand items.
customer_reviews.text: I paid over 600 dollars for a set of 13 pieces. The box was in perfect shape with 2 items damaged inside. It is a marked down set or may be returned. Not worth it. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes and lids, easy to store in one cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I always buy All Clad. I make sure to never use metal on these. They're beautiful, great sizes. Iam so stoked to have non stick as I've always just had the stainless steal All Clads that I still use after 20 years. Great addition!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. They go from stove top to oven and the food comes out great. I have given all my other pans away. Cleaning these pans is a breeze. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of pots & pans
customer_reviews.text: The pots are a bit odd, I’m accustomed to straighter sides, but I am learning to love them. I love the non-stick characteristic. These are solid with a metal bottom which means you can use them everywhere, except maybe over a campfire.
customer_reviews.author: V. Older

customer_reviews.title: Get All-Clad—you’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set from All-Clad! I had purchased a Calphalon set originally for half the price, and kicked myself for 2 months because of the aforementioned poor craftsmanship. I finally caved and bought these beautiful pots and pans, and I’ve never been happier (in the kitchen). My only regret was not buying them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: sandman

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new set of cookware and after much research landed on these. They are great in every way, except didn't come with a steamer. But the nonstick coasting is perfection! Everything cooks wonderfully :)
customer_reviews.author: J Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this set
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pans I’ve ever owned. I can’t believe I waited so long into my adult life to own this set.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Handles Uncomfortable to Hold
customer_reviews.text: The whole set looks extremely nice and I was excited to receive them. However, after handling them I decided to send back due to the handles being awkward to hold. Even while empty the pots are hard to keep steady while handling. The return process was super easy dropping off at a Kohl’s nearby and I truly appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: all-clad E785SB64 HA1 hard anodized nontick cookware set pots and pans 13 piece
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought any cookware that was made this well,heavy weigh,nice fit lids and pans are made very nice
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey ankiel

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware available
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line in cookware. Exceeded all of our expectations. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Philibuckster

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged, too heavy, not my best purchase. Returned and went with a set exactly like it but cheaper, lighter, and more ergonomic to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 pans were bent or warped
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the Pans were bent , warped. Was very surprised as heavy as these pans are. I knew it was open box. But thought I would just be dealing with a damaged box.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Lids and handles will be hot, while cooking.  We cannot touch the lids specifically.
customer_reviews.text: Daily regular cooking. Nice heavy well made. Distribution of heat is good. The only disadvantage of these are handle. Need to be very very careful all the time, before we touch the lids and handles. I personally had my hand burnt twice within 60 days of use. I wish the company might consider to change the handles for future production of these pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Sony

customer_reviews.title: All Clad
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pans. The only gripe is that the handles aren’t insulated. My wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Warped pans!
customer_reviews.text: Many of the pans do not sit flat- which means they do not make contact with the entire surface. They in turn do not heat up as they should and food does not cook evenly. Very disappointing at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: MrsZ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this 4 stars because the pans are heavy and you almost need two hands to use them. BUT, they are fantastic and I can cook with such lower heat now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Sager

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pots have gotten wider instead of tall. Only comes with two pots, neither one being small.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: We love this cookware.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the heavy side but the results out weigh this issue. They heat very quickly and evenly
customer_reviews.author: Scion 4B

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, solid, quality cookware. I've had it now for a month, so the jury is out (and I'll update later if it any problems) ... but so far, I am thrilled. Assuming the quality endures, it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: T40

customer_reviews.title: NOT a happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike after a few times using one of the pans the Anodizing was starting to fade.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: To heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way to heavy not easy to use. Gave them away
customer_reviews.author: Craig Warren

customer_reviews.title: good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for nonstick cooking, but the sizes are a bit large for normal meals and the pans are quite heavy to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Seebode

customer_reviews.title: Nothing will ever stick again.
customer_reviews.text: This pan set is amazing. As long as you only use plastic/rubber/wood utensils it will last a long time. We store the pans with cloth between each pan to ensure nothing will scratch the nonstick lining. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, nonstick set
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, easy to cook in and even easier to clean. Arrived with some minor damage; annoying concave handles. Be sure to purchase silicon utensils and silicon handle covers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a couple months, fits perfectly to our cooking needs with the variety in sizes, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Kalmoe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy, scratched after first time use. It was delivered with a chip in the pan also and didn’t want to pack up the whole set to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Nord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my mom, and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: maryi arriola

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up- still get a good sear.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why I waited so long to get these. Love them. Don’t mind doing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Return issue
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they are to heavy but unable to return even though not used
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Best pans I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pans I have ever owned. Quality product. They will last many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sites  - Springfield, Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Bought new but arrived used
customer_reviews.text: Box was destroyed when arrived. Pans inside were already unpackaged. Cat hairs on the pans. One had scratch marks. Clearly had been opened and used before. Unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Erik Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is so nice, great upgrade from my old set.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up
customer_reviews.text: Inside lining of pot started coming apart after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I have had All Clad for 25 years and love the all-around quality! So, I bought this for my daughters family, knowing she likes All Clad as well, from cooking with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set
customer_reviews.text: Great set, I wish the sauce pan was more traditional design.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pan set
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan set! They cook things well and they clean up easy. Can’t ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Braun

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for cook ware that was durable and would not warp. This cook ware appears to be so strong, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about All-Clad! It sits perfectly flat and cooks completely even across the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Cookware ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware set! The quality is hands down the best!!
customer_reviews.author: hilary g.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan no light weight copy cat here. Cooks evenly cleanup easy
customer_reviews.author: Martin P.

customer_reviews.title: They are on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: Other then one of the lids being dented they are fantastic. A bit on the heavy side for our 8 year old but you can tell they will last a lifetime. If you love to cook and like easy clean up (unlike stainless). Buy them
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift for my daughter. She reports being very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: It looks to be a good cook set but has quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: 5 star cookware
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone would give this cookware a bad review. I love it and for the reasonable price I could not have made a better choice!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Iron Clad cookware
customer_reviews.text: This is top of the line cookware but to expensive
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Best money I’ve spent!
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, solid construction and great non-stick (at least after a few months).
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These pans make cooking easy. They are also simple to clean. I highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cook
customer_reviews.text: Even temperature while cooking. Easy to clean. An absolute pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: Love our new cookware.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love cookware. Set consists of pots and pans we commonly use. Design, construction and weight is perfect. Amazing how much we're able to reduce burner settings. Heat transfer, with even cooking, is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lou J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the interior design. Not crazy about the handles, not the best design, uncomfortable to hold and don't fit in the bin under stove as well
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Only set you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set. LOVE. A bit on the weighty side, but I’ll take it for the durability and quality. Couldn’t be happier so far.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Cox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non stick for inductive cooking
customer_reviews.text: Converted to inductive cooking and bought All Clad D5. Then found that the convenience of non stick was something I wanted. This set very nicely compliments my D5 and I would not be without them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat-inCO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set. So easy to clean and they always ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. So easy to clean and they always look great.
customer_reviews.author: David M Karakas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is awesome. Heavy and durable We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Beautiful ! Buy It , Luxury quality , easy Cleaning , Old Fashion Look ! Perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love love these pans!!! I just added these to my stainless steel ones that I have... Living in Canonsburg PA where these are made are almost a collectors item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves them cant say that I have used them
customer_reviews.author: randy l. stoner

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooking set!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and perfect set for all our cooking needs!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Benigno

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these. They look and function great. Great pricing and fast delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Drew

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beauty! I love this set!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this cookware set! You get what you pay for, and I should have asked for these years ago! They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JumpMaster's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like my dishes but I feel I paid too much for them.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: 9 months old, and regret purchasing total crap
customer_reviews.text: They all have scratches on them, along with as you can see in the photo, enamel is cracking...for the price, I wouldn't think they'd be destroyed so soon. Definitely bummed on the quality of these pans for the amount of money spent on them. They won't replace these because they said warranty is voided for cooking using above MEDIUM option on my stove. DO NOT BUY THESE
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. Uniform heating. Cleans easy, inside and out. Sturdy build quality. PFOA free. Pans stay nice and flat when heated. I use the cookware on a glass top range and it works well. All pieces have a subtle cauldron-like shape (not straight wall). I wasn't sure how this form factor would affect cooking experience; I actually prefer this shape now, especially when stirring or sauteing. Please note that as not all pieces nest or stack all that well if you are interested in space saving. But I like this set so much, I recommend purchasing and making room for them regardless of your storage situation.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Super Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Best non-stick cookware we've ever owned... after our pampered brand pans began to warp and the non-stick surfaces began to chip off after years of use... we decided to search for a better set... that cost less than the prior chef brand... and we are thrilled to have made the purchase of these All-Clad cookware set... better than any we've ever used before! These heat evenly... and we use less oils and butters than any others... Just can't say enough good after using these for just a short while!
customer_reviews.author: PNW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT All-Clad Cookware for Induction Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookware for induction cooking - it really makes a huge difference when you buy cookware that is specially made for the induction technology. We are glad we spent the money for quality pots (also have Scanlan CTX) and these have a nice even heat that almost seems like the heat is coming from within the food, like a microwave effect - hard to describe unless you know what good induction cooking is. Will definitely add to our collection!
customer_reviews.author: reywalwen

customer_reviews.title: Was not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this set I was using a wore out cheaper set I had had for 20 years. I unboxed and washed everything and put them to work. The pots are heavy and sturdy, beautiful too. I do not know why people are complaining about the handles, the pictures clearly showed the stainless steel handles, grab a pot holder. Bonus feature is the pots curve in at the top so pushes the boil back in to the pot. Heats up quicker than any pots I have had. Due to finish I will always hand wash these, even though it says dishwasher safe. I have had All Clads stainless steel set for years, ALL CLAD did not disappoint once again!
customer_reviews.author: susan totten

customer_reviews.title: Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: All Clad leads you to believe that this set is made in America. Not True, they are made in China! They are so heavy and the handles are very difficult to work with. Back these went! I did call the company and their representatives were rude and condescending.
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick property but the handles suck!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to other reviewers that mentioned how difficult it is to hold the handles on this cookware. I love the non-stick surface and it is so easy to clean. Unfortunately the handles have a strange design that makes it difficult to maintain a tight grip. The cookware turns over in my hands and the handles are so long it is difficult to store them in my cupboard. I have to turn them around backward in order to fit them inside the cupboard. These need a different handle design. Unfornately I threw away all the packing before I could send them back. I suggest using a pot holder to help control the grip on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love ....need smaller saucepan to be exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of cookware. Pots and look super sleek and well made, not too heavy or light but perfectly substantial. It's a pleasure cooking with them but I won't be lazy this time by putting them in the dishwasher. The only thing that would make this order superb is if it contained a smaller saucepan for hollandaise sauce and such. The saucepans in this set are too large for that purpose but I knew that when purchasing. Will update review once I've used most of the cookware Happy new year!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I want to take them out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get these to go with our new range! The most expensive pots and pans we've purchased but we wanted quality. The video with this set CLEARLY states these are made in the USA and also "...from Canonsburg Pennsylvania, straight to your kitchen." We received them and the box CLEARLY states they are made in CHINA. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Dungbeetles

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. You will get about a year out of them before the coating starts to fail.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cookware, however, it is extremely heavy. Also, pot top handles get VERY hot, You can seriously burn yourself if you don’t use a potholder, I wish they had been rubber coated. I gave this cookware 3 stars because even though it does cook well, heat distributes evenly, it’s a little difficult to handle due to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new induction cooktop, and was advised to get a great set of pot and pans. I'm so glad I did! These are fantastic pans. You can dial the temperature you need without a problem. I really thought it was going to take me a while to get used to cooking with induction, and these pans made it quite simple.
customer_reviews.author: Caribeazul

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is great and I am very happy with the product itself. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because one of the sauce pans arrived with a few small scratches on the outside of it. Nothing major, but it must of happened during the packaging of the product. Aside that, they are great and I look forward to using them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade to regular non-stick pans!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the way these pans retain heat and cook more evenly. Never thought it would make that much of a difference, but it does. *i do not have induction stove.. i saw complaints about that, but for our gas stove, they are perfect! I had been using good pans over the years, but these are much better! Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work on mine
customer_reviews.text: This did not work on my induction stove top. I thought I had gotten a bad batch, so I returned it and got another set. Same problem. My stovetop kept clicking on and off, as if it didnt fully recognize that an induction ready pan on it. I had to get some calphalon ones that work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yashar Basseri

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Very heavyweight and you'll have to be prepared to use your arm muscles. The saute pan is much smaller than I was expecting and smaller than the one it replaced in my last set. It should definitely be 2" larger. I've already noticed scraping of the surface after only a half dozen uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled - Handles are NOT designed well!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super annoyed!! These handles are terrible!! It’s impossible to hold them!! My hands are actually bruised from getting them cleaned out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McWhinnie

customer_reviews.title: A cooking set worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these on TikTok recommended by a chef. These pans are fantastic. The non-stick quality is superb. Excellent value for the money. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans...for me money well spent...they are alittle heavy...but the quality makes up for that... my husband and I both like the look and style. Food cooks great easy to clean...love it
customer_reviews.author: susan groves

product_meta.title: All-Clad E785SB64 HA1 Hard Anodized Nonstick Cookware Set, Pots and Pans Set, 13 Piece, Black
product_meta.description: Size:13-Piece| Style Name:Cookware SetA great introduction to All-Clad, the All-Clad Hard Anodized E785SB64 13-piece nonstick cookware set includes 8 inch, 10 inch and 12 inch fry pans, 2. 5 quart and 3. 5 quart sauce pans with lids, a 4 quart sauté pan with lid, a 4 quart soup pot with lid and an 8 quart stockpot with lid. With HA1 Hard Anodized cookware, you can experience the renowned quality of All-Clad and the ultimate convenience of nonstick. The All-Clad cookware's three layers of PFOA-free nonstick coating ensure effortless food release and make cleanup a breeze. Even more, Hard Anodized nonstick cookware offers dishwasher-safe convenience, induction compatibility, and warp-resistant strength. Discover what it means to cook with All-Clad.
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: 8 inch, 10 inch and 12 inch fry pans, 2. 5 quart and 3. 5 quart sauce pans with lids, a 4 quart sauté pan with lid, a 4 quart Soup pot with lid and an 8 quart stockpot with lid
HARD ANODIZED CONSTRUCTION for fast, even heating and easy cleanup; stainless-steel bonded Anti-Warp base; optimized for induction
PFOA-FREE scratch resistant nonstick coating for healthier cooking with less fat; secure-fitting lids trap in heat and moisture and allow for checking on food at a glance
STAINLESS STEEL HANDLES contoured for a comfortable hold and permanently secured with stainless-steel rivets. Compatible with all stovetops including induction
OVEN SAFE to 500 degrees F (without lids)

Included Components: 13-Piece Cookware Set Includes 8 Inch, 10 Inch And 12 Inch Fry Pans, 2 Quart And 3 Quart Sauce Pans With Lids, A 4 Quart Sauté Pan With Lid, A 4 Quart Soup Pot With Lid And An 8 Quart Stockpot With Lid
